full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,MGON PO'I BLA BRGYUD BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SMON LAM BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG SMON TSIG BSLU MED MCHOD GSUM MA SOGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(SMRAS PA, TSUL 'DI BYA BTANG DGE SLONG MKHAS MCHOG DANG, NGAG DBANG GRAGS PAS NAN TAN CHEN PO YIS, ,YANG YANG BSKUL TSE DGE SLLONG NAM SENG GIS, ,'PHRAL DU BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE'I BYED PO NI, ,BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN YIN NO 'DI NYID LA, ,MA RTOGS LOG BSHAD 'KHRUL PA'I MA MCHIS NA, ,MKHAS DBANG RNAMS KYI THUGS KYIS MI KHRE'UL ZHU, ,DGE BAS BSTAN PA PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS GYUR CIG , ,,)
